img.alt: Lemont H.S. to remain closed through at least April 3, 2020

div.a: Lemont H.S. to remain closed through at least April 3, 2020

div.p: Lemont High School will remain closed at least through Friday, April 3. Students will begin eLearning activities on Tuesday, March 17

article.a: Continue Reading This Article about Lemont H.S. to remain closed through at least April 3, 2020

img.alt: Lemont H.S. to be closed on March 13, 2020

div.a: Lemont H.S. to be closed on March 13, 2020

div.p: In an effort to ensure the health and well-being of students, faculty and staff, and their families, Lemont High School will be closed on Friday, March 13.

article.a: Continue Reading This Article about Lemont H.S. to be closed on March 13, 2020

img.alt: (L-R): Tadas Rimkevicius, Katelyn Parent, Annette Winterland, Erin Barndollar

div.a: Lemont High School honors March “Students of the Month”

div.p: Four Lemont High School students were honored with March “Student of the Month” accolades at the district’s Board of Education meeting on March 9.

article.a: Continue Reading This Article about Lemont High School honors March “Students of the Month”

section.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow styled-calendar fsItemCount_20 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.div: Lemont High School, 800 Porter St, Lemont, IL 60439, United States

div.p: Lemont High School was selected as an "Exemplary High Performing School" through the United States Department of Education's 2017 National Blue Ribbon Schools Program.
Demonstrating excellence and thought leadership through the innovative use of technology, Lemont High School District 210 has been named a Google for Education Reference District.

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

article.h2: In-person instruction at Lemont H.S. cancelled through May 21

p.em: If you or a loved one are struggling with stress related to the COVID-19 pandemic and need emotional support, text TALK to 552020 for English or HABLAR for Spanish. This service is free and available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. People seeking assistance will remain anonymous and will provide only their first name and zip code, which enables the service to link you to a counselor in your area who is knowledgeable about available local resources. Please click here for additional mental health resources compiled by Lemont High School's Student Services Team.

div.p: In-person instruction at Lemont High School is cancelled through the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. All extra-curricular activities are cancelled until further notice. Students will participate in eLearning activities each school day through Thursday, May 21.
